title: Second email account is duplicating the first email account I added.
content:
I am a new user to TB.

  • downloaded and installed TB.
  • Added yahoo email account #1. I happened to be logged in to that webmail account in another browser tab. TB asked me to log into the server in and everything worked fine.
  • Added yahoo email account #2. I was still logged into yahoo email account #1. This time TB DID NOT ask me to log into the server. And it incorrectly downloaded all the mail from account #1.
  • Deleted account #2. Made sure I was logged out of webmail. Added account #2, but it still "remembered" what it had done above. Again, TB DID NOT ask me to log into the server account. And still incorrectly downloaded all the email from account #1.
  • Added yahoo email account #3. And it all worked the same as account #1, including asking me to log into the server account. Downloaded all the correct emails and files.
  • Removed each email account.
  • Uninstalled TB. Then re-installed it from clean.
  • Exact same problems as above re-occured.
  • Some how TB is "remembering" the settings from the previous installs and adding of email accounts.
  • And I can't seem to get it to forget these settings and start over again.

Any help would be greatly appreciated.
